fixes.title: Add missing security headers: x-content-type-options, x-frame-options
fixes.description: The security scan found missing HTTP security headers on /. Missing required headers: x-content-type-options, x-frame-options. These protect against MIME-sniffing, clickjacking, and other client-side attacks.
fixes.claudeCodePrompt: In src/middleware.ts, check that the following security headers are being set on all responses: x-content-type-options, x-frame-options. The security agent found these missing on /. If they are already in the code, the issue may be that Railway or Cloudflare is stripping them — in that case, just note this and don't change the code. Test with npm run build. Do not commit unless you actually changed code.
